name: Jackson's Revenge
description:
You play as Jackson, the angry sloth. He has been woken up from his sleep by really loud tanks, sharks - you name it. Now he is on a mission to kill them all, using whatever tools he may find. Eventually, Jackson may end up finding SodaLand. 

Featuring:
- Boring Tank: A rolling tank that just shoots. He has no true purpose in life. 
- Kawaii Shark: Some sharks forget they swim - so they fly instead. This shark has a bomb and is very cute, so watch out!
- Duck:
- Jackson: A sloth with immense anger-issues. He is your protagonist here. 

There is a number of projectiles you may find. Some have different effects than others. 

Notes: 
- The first game I ever made, in around 2016
- As buggy as you can only imagine, not planning to keep updating it
- Currently only has 2 stages
